xhochy commented on pull request #8757:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8757#issuecomment-733180367


   > Running the cmake autoformatter heavily modifies the touched cmake files; should I be doing that?
   
   Maybe you have a different version of that installed and that formats differently? You can also summon the autoformatter with `@github-actions<space>autotune` on the PR.

 ARROW_BROTLI_BUILD_VERSION=v1.0.7
 ARROW_BZIP2_BUILD_VERSION=1.0.8
 ARROW_CARES_BUILD_VERSION=1.16.1
+ARROW_CRC32C_BUILD_VERSION=1.0.6
 ARROW_GBENCHMARK_BUILD_VERSION=v1.5.2
+ARROW_GCPSDK_BUILD_VERSION=v1.20.0

 ARROW_GRPC_BUILD_VERSION=v1.29.1
 ARROW_GTEST_BUILD_VERSION=1.8.1
 ARROW_JEMALLOC_BUILD_VERSION=5.2.1
 ARROW_LZ4_BUILD_VERSION=v1.9.2
 ARROW_MIMALLOC_BUILD_VERSION=v1.6.4
+ARROW_NLOHMANN_JSON_BUILD_VERSION=v3.9.0

Review comment:
       Whoops, thanks! I missed that. I've added the URLs for the dependencies I've inserted into `versions.txt`.
   
   However, I've left out the backup URLs that use the ursa-labs archive in `ThirdPartyDependencies.cmake`, which I understand will be derived from the `versions.txt` URL eventually (if this gets merged). Let me know if its appropriate to link add these URLs.
